source_text: Welcome to RunArt Foundation, a contemporary art gallery dedicated to showcasing emerging and established artists. Our collection features paintings, sculptures, and digital art from around the world. We believe in the power of art to inspire, challenge, and transform. Visit our gallery to explore red abstract paintings, blue contemporary artworks, and green modern sculptures.

enriched_en.headline: RunArt Foundation - Contemporary Art Gallery - Enhanced Version
enriched_en.summary: Enhanced content with 2 visual references based on AI semantic correlation.
enriched_en.body:
## Enhanced Content

This version incorporates visual references automatically suggested through semantic similarity analysis between text and image embeddings.

### Original Content

Welcome to RunArt Foundation, a contemporary art gallery dedicated to showcasing emerging and established artists. Our collection features paintings, sculptures, and digital art from around the world. We believe in the power of art to inspire, challenge, and transform. Visit our gallery to explore red abstract paintings, blue contemporary artworks, and green modern sculptures.

enriched_es.body:
## Contenido Enriquecido

Esta versión incorpora referencias visuales sugeridas automáticamente mediante análisis de similitud semántica entre embeddings de texto e imagen.

### Contenido Original

Welcome to RunArt Foundation, a contemporary art gallery dedicated to showcasing emerging and established artists. Our collection features paintings, sculptures, and digital art from around the world. We believe in the power of art to inspire, challenge, and transform. Visit our gallery to explore red abstract paintings, blue contemporary artworks, and green modern sculptures.
